parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent activation of the Anti-lock Braking System (ABS) can cause extended stopping distances, loss of braking power, and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: ABS light on the dashboard illuminates
brake pedal feels soft or spongy
brake pedal travels to the floor
vehicle takes longer to stop
grinding noise when brakes are applied.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Faulty ABS sensors can cause the ABS system to malfunction, leading to extended stopping distances, loss of braking power, and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: ABS light on the dashboard illuminates
brake pedal feels soft or spongy
brake pedal travels to the floor
vehicle takes longer to stop.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Excessive brake pedal travel can cause extended stopping distances, loss of braking power, and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Brake pedal travels to the floor
brake pedal feels soft or spongy
vehicle takes longer to stop.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake line failure can cause loss of braking power, extended stopping distances, and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Brake pedal feels soft or spongy
brake pedal travels to the floor
vehicle takes longer to stop.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Brake Light and Hazard Light Failure due to Multifunction Switch Defect
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake lights and hazard lights can increase the risk of accidents, as following drivers may not be aware of the vehicle's intentions, leading to potential rear-end collisions.
symptoms: Brake lights and hazard lights stop working
turn signals malfunction
intermittent failure of exterior lights
sudden loss of brake light function without warning.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Failure of Brake Light Switch due to Recall Neglect
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake light switch can lead to accidents, as the brake lights may not function properly, increasing the risk of rear-end collisions.
symptoms: Brake lights do not operate
hazard lights and turn signals malfunction
sudden loss of brake light function without warning.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Inadequate Recall Response and Lack of Coverage
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the manufacturer to respond adequately to recall notices and provide coverage for affected vehicles can lead to financial burdens on owners and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Owners receive recall notices but are denied coverage or assistance
dealerships are unaware of recalls or refuse to assist
owners are forced to pay for repairs out of pocket.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the EBCM computer module can cause the brake and ABS lights to illuminate, leading to a false sense of security for the driver. In slippery situations, the vehicle may not stop as designed, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Brake and ABS lights on the dashboard
brakes still work but do not function as designed
false sense of security for the driver.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The faulty brake and ABS light system can lead to accidents or near-misses due to the driver's lack of awareness of brake and ABS system malfunctions.
symptoms: Brake and ABS lights on the dashboard
no brake lights
loss of brake functionality.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Battery Cable Routing and Fire Hazard
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The poorly designed battery cable routing can cause a fire hazard, potentially leading to vehicle damage, injury, or loss of life.
symptoms: Fire occurring in the vehicle
battery cables damaged or shorted
smoke coming from under the hood.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The repeated failure of the window motor can lead to inconvenience and potential safety issues, such as not being able to roll up windows in an emergency.
symptoms: Window motor failure
windows stuck in down position
repeated repairs needed.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The repeated failure of the cap and rotor can cause the vehicle to stall, leading to dangerous situations on the road.
symptoms: Vehicle stalling
cap and rotor failure
wet conditions under the cap.
